feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles, such as commas and quotation marks, to separate clauses and dialogue.

feature2.explanation: There are differences in lexical and grammatical features between the two texts; one text includes informal language and profanity, while the other discusses political matters in a more formal tone.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in the two texts vary significantly; one text contains shorter, more fragmented sentences, while the other has longer, more complex sentences.

feature4.explanation: The text styles differ in terms of narrative and tone; one text expresses frustration and casual speech, while the other presents a more analytical and serious tone.

feature5.explanation: There is no evidence of spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the mixed scores across different features, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate.
